properties.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<policies>
  <inbound>
    <base />
    <!-- Starter: 500 req/min, 5k req/week -->
    <rate-limit-by-key calls="500" renewal-period="60" counter-key="@(context.Subscription.Id)" />
    <quota-by-key calls="5000" renewal-period="604800" counter-key="@(context.Subscription.Id)" />
  </inbound>
  <backend>
    <base />
  </backend>
  <outbound>
    <base />
  </outbound>
  <on-error>
    <base />
  </on-error>
</policies>
